p: Researchers will use plasma from patients recovering for at least 28Â days to increase antibody levels. The main findings from available data are as follows: (a)mortality may be reduced by plasma therapy in critically ill patients, (b) neutralizing antibody titers are increased and disappearance of SARS-CoV-2 RNA after CP therapy, and (c) beneficial effect on clinical symptoms after administration of convalescent plasma [ 57].
